1616503348_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4.body: One thing ZeroNet has needed for some time is a website builder/manager similar to Wordpress baked into the app. I can get by with using a third-party's software to make a zite of my own, but it would be better to have one in-house to ensure compatibility and speed up deployment/updates. Especially when all I want to do is post an original article or video.

> [croatame](#comment_15_19RaaMJeGXcJzLxeKXWH9pynfjgmm33VZS): Why not clone ZeroBlog and modify it to your liking?

I've considered that before, but I would essentially be building a new theme from scratch with the changes I would like to make to the clone. If I just wanted to create a traditional blog, it would be enough and it would be on the network by now.
